faqs.question: How does the Texture Atlas feature work?
faqs.answer:
### Texture Atlas

[image]https://i.imgur.com/Mav3P9e.png[/image]

[info]Texture atlas combines multiple textures into one to drastically reduce draw calls and improve model performance[/info]

#### Features:
- Create Atlas: Combines selected materials into one texture
- Generate Material List: Lists all materials for selection

#### Useful Tips:
- Split transparent and non-transparent textures into separate atlases
- Keep textures under 2048x2048 for Unity (unless configured otherwise)
- Unity can support up to 8k textures by changing settings:
[image]https://i.imgur.com/o01T4Gb.png[/image]

faqs.question: What bone optimization tools are available?
faqs.answer:
[image]https://github.com/Yusarina/Cats-Blender-Plugin-Unofficial-/assets/104736380/021a9a5e-22eb-44b2-8780-924720113571[/image]

### Bone Merging
[image]https://i.imgur.com/PL8THn8.png[/image]

#### Features:
- Merge Bones: Reduces overall bone count in groups
- Merge Weights: Transfers weights to parent bones
- Delete Zero Weight Bones: Removes unused bones
- Delete Constraints: Removes unused VRChat constraints
- Duplicate Bones: Creates _L or _R duplicates
- Connect Bones: Links bones to children

faqs.question: What material and mesh optimization options are available?
faqs.answer:
[image]https://github.com/Yusarina/Cats-Blender-Plugin-Unofficial-/assets/104736380/a49d7ce8-9ddb-4be5-a440-8847aa1bfd4d[/image]

#### Features:
- Combine Materials: Reduces draw calls
- Convert Textures to PNG: Improves compatibility
- Join Meshes: Combines all or selected meshes
- Remove Doubles: Merges duplicate geometry
